name: Rapidash
flavorText:
Very competitive,
this POKéMON will
chase anything that moves fast
in the hopes of
racing it.

previous.name: Ponyta
previous.flavorText:
Its hooves are 10
times harder than
diamonds. It can trample anything
completely flat
in little time.

next.name: Slowpoke
next.flavorText:
Incredibly slow
and dopey. It
takes 5 seconds for it to feel
pain when under
attack.
